Author: ks788
Text: My dad is like that too. It makes comments like “she’s too fat” or “she doesn’t look like an actress” I’m 100% sure it’s because of his own insecurity but it really hurts me sometimes.

Author: HappierHungry
Text: my dad is the same, and it drives me nuts -- he has a real black and white way of thinking about *everything*, which means in his mind anyone who is overweight must be that way because they're "lazy, with no self-control" and therefore left themselves open to ridicule. it's impossible to reason with him, it's incredibly frustrating.
